resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74244</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>cef21788-7a33-483b-b4a4-5f2066bc2700#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">12. századi lovaszászlók</string>
            <string language="en">Cavalry standard from the 12th century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kavalleriestandard vom 12. Jahrhundert</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Norme de cavalerie du 12ème siècle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Padrão da cavalaria do 1ò século</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Standard del cavalry dal dodicesimo secolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρότυπα ιππικού από το 12$ο αιώνα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estándar de la caballería a partir del 12mo 
siglo</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Előreszegezett lándzsával vágtató magyar lovag és Árpád-kori zászlók (1-4. kép)</string>
            <string language="en">Galloping Hungarian knight holding forward a spear and standards from the Arpadian age (picture 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Színes zászlók nehézlovas kettoskereszt,  </string>
            <string language="en">Colourful flags heavy cavalryman double cross</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Galoppierender ungarischer Ritter, der vorwärts 
eine Stange und Standards vom Arpadian Alter (Abbildung 1-4) anhält</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chevalier hongrois galopant tenant en avant une 
lance et des normes de l'âge d'Arpadian (image 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Knight hungarian galloping que prende para a 
frente uma lança e padrões da idade de Arpadian (retrato 1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La tenuta ungherese galloping del cavaliere 
in avanti un germoglio e standard dal Arpadian invecchia (immagine 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καλπάζοντας ουγγρική εκμετάλλευση ιπποτών προς τα 
εμπρός μια λόγχη και πρότυπα από το Arpadian γερνά (εικόνα 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El caballero húngaro galloping que sostiene 
adelante una lanza y los estándares del Arpadian envejecen (cuadro 
1-4)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Betrug des bunten Markierungsfahnen schweren 
Cavalryman</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Double croix de cavalryman lourd coloré d'indicateurs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cruz dobro do cavalryman pesado colorido das bandeiras</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Doppia traversa del cavalryman pesante colourful delle 
bandierine</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζωηρόχρωμος βαρύς cavalryman διπλός σταυρός σημαιών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cruz doble del cavalryman pesado colorido de los 
indicadores</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
